title: Using NA prepaid cards
body:
Is it possible to use a bunch of $10 NA prepaid cards in oce? 
My account was made on NA, and someone thought it'd be funny to transfer me to oceania so I have to transfer back

replies.body:
I don't think you can. It would just tell you that the code doesn't exist.

You can make a support ticket to Riot about this and see what they can do about transferring you back.
